New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 50th ODI century, surpassing Sachin Tendulkar's record.
Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets in the match, the quickest by anyone in World Cup history.
Shreyas Iyer made another successive World Cup century, joining a select group of players.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli's 50th century and subsequent record.
Mohammed Shami's crucial performance with 7 wickets.
